tool.help:
HAllA (Hierarchical All-against-All association) is a method for finding blocks of associated features in high-dimensional datasets measured from a common set of samples. HAllA operates by
* Optionally discretizing mixed continuous and categorical features to a uniform representation
* Hierarchically clustering each dataset separately to generate a pair of data hierarchies
* Performing all-against-all association testing between features across two datasets using robust measures of correlation
* Determining the statistical significance of individual associations by permutation testing
* Iteratively subdividing the space of significant all-against-all correlations into blocks of densely associated occurring as clusters in the original datasets.
.. image:: https://github.com/biobakery/galaxy-upgrade/blob/main/galaxy_halla/fig1.png?raw=true :height: 290 :width: 800
.. _Sample_X: https://github.com/biobakery/galaxy-upgrade/blob/main/galaxy_halla/X_16_100.tab .. _Sample_Y: https://github.com/biobakery/galaxy-upgrade/blob/main/galaxy_halla/Y_16_100.tab
**Inputs** ==========
HAllA requires as input two tab-delimited text files representing two paired datasets (sets of features) describing the same set of samples.
Sample data is avalable using the following links:
* Sample_X_
* Sample_Y_
Please download the files to your PC and upload them to Galaxy using the "Get Data / Upload file" in Galaxy
**Outputs** ===========
.. image:: https://github.com/biobakery/galaxy-upgrade/blob/main/galaxy_halla/Halla_fig2.png?raw=true :height: 470 :width: 800
We provide two outputs:
* A pdf - the "halagram.pdf" * A zip file containing all the files in the generated output directory
.. _Halla_Tutorial: https://github.com/biobakery/biobakery/wiki/halla .. _Halla_User_Manual: https://github.com/biobakery/halla .. _Halla_User_Forum: https://forum.biobakery.org/c/Downstream-analysis-and-statistics/HAllA/
